'''Hilichurl Shooters''' are [[Hilichurls]] who use crossbows in battle.

In combat, they fire single bolts at the player matching their elemental type. In some [[Domains]], [[Events]] and [[Commissions]], they will fire five bolts in a ~45 degree spread in front of them instead.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|[[Hilichurls]] that use crossbows to attack at range.<br>Given their limited mental capacity, learning to wield a crossbow is extremely difficult for them, which leads one to wonder how they could craft such intricate equipment in the first place. One could speculate that there's an organization working behind the scenes to provide equipment and training to these hilichurls, seemingly scattered across the land...|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}
